body.p:
MONROE CIRCUIT COURT:
Commonwealth Plaintiff
against } Recognizance Bond.
John R. F Lee & G W Lee Defendant

This day the defendants John R F & G W Lee together with N Y Hilman his Security, came before me, as the clerk of the Monroe Circuit Court, and undertook that they would satisfy and pay the sumPlff the Judgment, including interest and cost, amounting to $207 and 93 cents, rendered in her favor, against the said Jno R F & G W. Lee by the Court, within three months, with legal interest on the whole amount thereof from this date.
Given under our hands this, 2nd day of Oct 1860

G W Lee
N Y Hilman

J B C Vans D C for
N T Buckner clk

Commonwealth
vs } Recog Bond
Jno R F Lee &c
To 2nd Jany 1861
copy Att
N T Buckner clk
By Isaiah Fitzgerald D C
The amount of the within bond except the cost and Attys fee has been respited for twelve months by the Govenor the respite bearing date from the first of June last
